title: Replay From Previous Patch
body:
Hello Riot,

I have been trying to play my replay from patch 7.19 but due to the latest patch it does not allow me to play the replay. If possible, could you give me a work around onto how to play 7.19 Patches on 7.20 or if possible send me the previous patch so, I can play my replay off the Client itself. 

Thanks in Advanced!

replies.body: I don't think you'll be able to play that one anymore since it was saved on an older patch. If you had saved a highlight prior to updating, you should still be able to open those normally.
